The post Zhiyu Moke Birthday Celebration appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hello bunnies! Zhiyu Moke’s birthday is coming up! On December 10th at midnight (CST), there will be a celebration PV of his debut song, Virtual Teenager (è™šæ‹Ÿå°‘å¹´) on Bilibili for his birthday. It is composed by Himmel, with qqq-kun as tuner and lyrics by å¤§å¤. The song originally debuted at Bilibili Macro Link in 2017 as his demo song.

At 18:00 (CST) they will release a new song, titled “Follow Me”. Finally, he will be getting limited edition merch: a wood print and an acrylic stand, both set at 128 Yuan, along with the commemorative illustration of Catcan.

Â 

There is also an official video announcing his birthday! Wow, he’s such a rebel! I’m so excited! In his video, he says:

â€œHey guys, Iâ€™m Zhiyu Moke. Iâ€™ll be celebrating my birthday on December 10th – I hope to see you there. The virtual boy will return as promised… Iâ€™ll be waiting!â€

You can find the official video on Weibo here. You can also find the announcement post on Weibo here!

UPDATE: The official video has now been uploaded on Weibo, you can watch it here!

 

The post Zhiyu Moke Birthday Celebration appeared first on VNN.

Hello bunnies!! I want to share news of a new Sakura Miku Figure by Taito Toys!

ãªã‚“ã¨ï¼ã‚„ã™ã‚‚å…ˆç”Ÿã€ã‹ã‚‚ä»®é¢å…ˆç”Ÿã®æãä¸‹ã‚ã—ã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ãŸã€ãƒ•ã‚£ã‚®ãƒ¥ã‚¢ãŒ2ç¨®ç™»å ´ï¼
ä»–è³ã‚‚å…¨ç¨®æãä¸‹ã‚ã—ã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ãŸè±ªè¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒŠãƒƒãƒ—ã«ãªã£ã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã™ï¼

Automatic Translation by Twitter:

“Breaking news!

Next April #æ¡œãƒŸã‚¯ “First lottery will be released! What! Two types of figures using illustrations drawn by Yasmo-sensei and Kamen-sensei! The other prizes are also a luxurious lineup using illustrations drawn by all species! We will introduce each award in detail later!

Stay tuned for more information!

#åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯#ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ¼”

I’m very excited!! I absolutely love Sakura Miku, as the spring season is my favorite season! We will update this post when there is more information.

So let’s talk about it! I absolutely love the details, the pose… well, everything!! My wallet is already crying! I think my favorite would be the first one! What do you think?

Sources:

Taito Toys’ official Twitter

 

The post Sakura Miku by Taito Toys appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku: Miku With You 2019 Open for Preorder
item.dc:creator: melobuniiP
item.description:
Hello bunnies! Hatsune Miku: Miku With You 2019, 1/7th scale figure is now open for preorder on Tokyo Otaku Mode. The figure is set to be released in August 2020 and can be preordered now until November 20th, 2019 for the price of $311.59 USD on TOM’s premium price or at $327.99 USD on TOM’s …

The post Hatsune Miku: Miku With You 2019 Open for Preorder appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hello bunnies! Hatsune Miku: Miku With You 2019, 1/7th scale figure is now open for preorder on Tokyo Otaku Mode. The figure is set to be released in August 2020 and can be preordered now until November 20th, 2019 for the price of $311.59 USD on TOM’s premium price or at $327.99 USD on TOM’s regular sale price. You can preorder her on Tokyo Otaku Mode here! Be sure to get her now before its too late!

The figure is designed by Furyu(F:NEX) and is sculpted by Design COCO. The illustrator behind this lovely figure is ç»‡å¸ƒæœºloom who has previously made illustrations for *Luna‘s videos.

The post Hatsune Miku: Miku With You 2019 Open for Preorder appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Sega MegaMix T-Shirt Contest
item.dc:creator: melobuniiP
item.description:
Hello bunnies, I’m back!! Today Miku’s English Twitter announced a t-shirt contest to promote the Switch game “Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Mega Mix” or “Hatsune Miku Mega 39”. Celebrate the upcoming launch of Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Mega Mix in the West by submitting a t-shirt design! Five lucky winners will have their designs featured …

The post Sega MegaMix T-Shirt Contest appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hello bunnies, I’m back!! Today Miku’s English Twitter announced a t-shirt contest to promote the Switch game “Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Mega Mix” or “Hatsune Miku Mega 39”.

Celebrate the upcoming launch of Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Mega Mix in the West by submitting a t-shirt design!

Five lucky winners will have their designs featured in the game!

Rules & Details: https://t.co/5FaPQWbdAQ

— Hatsune Miku (@cfm_miku_en) November 8, 2019

You can enter the contest by submitting a t-shirt design and the winners will be announced and featured in Mega Mix. How fun! Here are the rules and details.

—

Celebrate the Tenth Anniversary of Hatsune Mikuâ€™s gaming debut by showing us your Project DIVA-inspired designs! Submit your Miku and friends-inspired T-shirt design for a chance to have it featured in Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Mega Mix for Nintendo Switch, coming to the West in 2020.

  1. Download the T-shirt design template.
  1. Design a special T-shirt for Miku and friends!
    Official characters recognized by Crypton: Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len, Megurine Luka, KAITO & MEIKO.
  2. Use the form to submit your design by November 18, 2019.
  3. Five Winners will be contacted by email on or about December 2, 2019.
  • Give us your best Project DIVA-inspired design! Use of characters in design is not required.
  • All designs should be made within the confines of the black lines. Crucial design elements should be kept within the confines of the red lines as there may be cutoff depending on the shape of the T-shirt and character wearing it.
  • File Type: jpg, png
  • Dimensions: 4096Ã—2048
  • Color Mode: RGB
  • Design hi name to be limited to 20 characters.
  • No third-party designs, logos or photographs.
  • Multiple entries per person are allowed.

Entry images can be no larger than 2MB!!

Have lots of fun, and remember, it’s a friendly contest!

Source:

Official Website

Twitter post

The post Sega MegaMix T-Shirt Contest appeared first on VNN.

item.title: FuRyu Prize Debuts “TOONIZE” Figurines!
item.dc:creator: melobuniiP
item.description:
Hello bunnies! The debut of a new figurine brand named “TOONIZE” was announced today! The first characters to be represented it is Hatsune Miku and friends, otherwise known as the Hatsune Miku series! æ–°ãƒ•ã‚£ã‚®ãƒ¥ã‚¢ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã€TOONIZEï¼ˆãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒ³ãƒŠã‚¤ã‚ºï¼‰ã€ãŒãƒ•ãƒªãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒ—ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚ºã‚ˆã‚Šãƒ‡ãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ï¼ç¬¬1å¼¾ã¯åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ã‚·ãƒªãƒ¼ã‚ºï¼ãƒŸã‚¯ï¼†ãƒªãƒ³ï¼†ãƒ¬ãƒ³ãŒã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒ³é¢¨ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ¡ã§ç«‹ä½“åŒ–â˜…ç›£ä¿®ä¸­ã®åŸå‹ç”»åƒï¼†ã‚¤ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’åˆå…¬é–‹ã„ãŸã—ã¾ã™ã€‚20å¹´æ˜¥ã‹ã‚‰å±•é–‹äºˆå®šâ˜…ç¶šå ±ã‚’ãŠæ¥½ã—ã¿ã«ï¼#åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ #TOONIZE pic.twitter.com/RcCjJoIn44— ã€ãƒ•ãƒªãƒ¥ãƒ¼å…¬å¼ã€‘PRIZE info (@FURYU_prize) November 6, 2019 As of now, the virtual idols that have been announced so far include …

The post FuRyu Prize Debuts “TOONIZE” Figurines! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hello bunnies! The debut of a new figurine brand named “TOONIZE” was announced today! The first characters to be represented it is Hatsune Miku and friends, otherwise known as the Hatsune Miku series!

æ–°ãƒ•ã‚£ã‚®ãƒ¥ã‚¢ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã€TOONIZEï¼ˆãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒ³ãƒŠã‚¤ã‚ºï¼‰ã€ãŒãƒ•ãƒªãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒ—ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚ºã‚ˆã‚Šãƒ‡ãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ï¼
ç¬¬1å¼¾ã¯åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ã‚·ãƒªãƒ¼ã‚ºï¼
ãƒŸã‚¯ï¼†ãƒªãƒ³ï¼†ãƒ¬ãƒ³ãŒã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒ³é¢¨ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ¡ã§ç«‹ä½“åŒ–â˜…
ç›£ä¿®ä¸­ã®åŸå‹ç”»åƒï¼†ã‚¤ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’åˆå…¬é–‹ã„ãŸã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
20å¹´æ˜¥ã‹ã‚‰å±•é–‹äºˆå®šâ˜…ç¶šå ±ã‚’ãŠæ¥½ã—ã¿ã«ï¼#åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ #TOONIZE pic.twitter.com/RcCjJoIn44

— ã€ãƒ•ãƒªãƒ¥ãƒ¼å…¬å¼ã€‘PRIZE info (@FURYU_prize) November 6, 2019

As of now, the virtual idols that have been announced so far include Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Len, and Kagamine Rin so far. Furthermore, the figures will be three dimensional, with cartoon-like features more unique to what you normally see.

Not only that, but the FuRyu Company, in collaboration with Chara-Hiroba, revealed a prototype of the trio, too! We have included the full resolution image here, but you can also view it in their official tweet!

Now, compared to the more traditional, anime-inspired designs that make nendoroids and figures so distinct, these statues have a more cartoon-inspired style. The dramatized features and more abstract shapes are very different than what we expect from the usual anime figure!

The original image and full illustration will be released soon, detailing more information about this new style of prize figures.Â 

As of now, they are scheduled for a spring 2020 release!

We’ll keep you updated with more information, soon! For now, which figures are you most excited for? Let us know in the comments!

Sources

FuRyu Prize can be found on Twitter and their website!
Chara Hiroba is available via their official website, as well.

 

The post FuRyu Prize Debuts “TOONIZE” Figurines! appeared first on VNN.
